entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignInInterceptor - Use case = Force user to change password #42669
  • API additions for RateLimitingMiddleware #42667
    7.0-preview7
  • Question: Process for adding a provider to the "Community Maintained Store Providers" documentation #42663
  • Test Blazor WebAssembly with Edge WASM interpreter ("DrumBrake") #42662
  • Blazor running under IIS starts throwing 503 without any error. #42661
  • Quarantine ApplicationInitializationPageIsRequested #42658
    Test failures
  • Cannot run IntegrationTests on WebSockets, and cannot self-host server in a test #42657
  • HTTP/3: Try to avoid QuicStreamContext.ConnectionClosed cancellation token #42652
    7.0-rc1
  • aspnetcore Abnormal prompt during operation #42647

Closed

  • New AddHostedService extension accepting Type as parameter #42673
  • Adding a new Enhanced Connect :protocol pseudo-header #42002
    7.0-preview7
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core to default namespaces #42516
  • Add antiforgery (anti-csrf) support to minimal endpoints #38630
    7.0-preview7
  • Blazor WASM does not work in Edge Enhanced Security mode #42641
    Discussions
  • MVC View Not Found when running application directly #42644
  • Blazor WASM Hot Reload not working; "General Exception This error was not expected, your process might be corrupted..." #42634
  • No download button on browser #42554
  • Blazor Server silent connection crash when using InputFile Component #42656

PullRequests

Created

  • Trim identity #42675
    area-identity
  • [dotnet user-jwts] Move signing key details to top-level property #42674
    area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • Efficiently buffer to disk #42672
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] [.NET Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #42671
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] Add DisplayName Forms component #42670
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Quarantine ApplicationInitializationPageIsRequested #42659
    area-runtime
  • Reuse Http3MessageBody #42648
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove Pseudo-Headers From Public API #42496
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Bump SDK version to 7.0.100-preview.7.22361.1 #42668
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Update baselines & Archives, merge internal commits #42666
    2.1.x
  • Remove Auth validation when Form File upload #42586
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `34c6f4e` to `e89e601` #42654
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4219e72` to `4556086` #42653
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement code fixer to change the code from calling Configure methods to using builder.Configuration #42630
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add utf8 text overloads for creating results #42595
    area-runtime
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Remove Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS 2.2.0 from /src/Servers/IIS/IIS/test/testassets/InProcessNewShimWebSite #42624
    area-runtime, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, .NET
  • [draft] JavaScript interop via [JSImport] and [JSExport] #41665
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1872625 #42636
    area-mvc
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
